entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
